description: This file defines the EventsScreen widget for a Flutter app, displaying a list of events from a provider and allowing the user to add new events via a dialog.

classes.name: EventsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of events and a button to add new ones.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the EventsScreen, displaying either a message when no events are available or a list of EventCards, along with a floating action button to add new events.
